General.Name: Sumeeko Industries Co Ltd
General.Description: Sumeeko Industries Co., Ltd. provides metal parts in Taiwan. The company offers power trains, suspensions, transmissions, exhausts, chassis, and interior parts for use in automobiles, as well as screw and bolt, nuts, and other parts. It serves mechanism, appliance, automotive, construction, and other industries. The company was founded in 1988 and is based in Kaohsiung, Taiwan.
